title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Skills: Instructional Design Technology (IDT) for Expanding Psychotherapy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Core psychological theories and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Participants can design psychotherapy education programs using IDT core principles (e.g., ADDIE model)
Can identify and resolve 80%+ of ethical/practical issues arising during evidence-based treatment (ESTs) education
Can propose ≥3 educational strategies using smartphone-based assistive tools (recording/memo apps) in limited-technology environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
